// Restricted // 
NO.CAS-8(4)/2010/DIV.I(Vehicle) 
GOVERNMENT OF INDIA 
BUREAU OF CIVIL AVIATION SECURITY 
(MINISTRY OF CIVIL AVIATION) 
A’ WING JANPATH BHAWAN 
JANPATH, NEW DELHI 
Dated:   01 /02/2011 
 
 
AVSEC CIRCULAR  NO. 07 / 2011 
 
 
Subject :   Permission for access of vehicle up to the tarmac on medical  
                  grounds in respect of Dr.Karan Singh, President, Indian  
                  Council for Cultural Relations  
 
 
 
        
Please refer to this Bureau Circular No.07/2010 dated 18/02/2010 on 
the subject cited above.  
 
      
Dr.Karan Singh, President, Indian Council for Cultural Relations is 
hereby permitted to take his own vehicle upto the tarmac during his departure / 
arrival by air at all airports in the country, on medical grounds for further a 
period of one year w.e.f 18/02/2011. 
 
                 This issues with the approval of Commissioner of Security (CA). 
 
 
 
 
 
 ( R.N.Dhoke, IPS )  
Addl. Commissioner of Security (CA) 
 
Distribution as per list attached/ overleaf. 
 
 
Copy to: 
 
 
1. 
MCA ( Shri S.Gowri Shankar, Under Secretary), R.G.Bhawan, New Delhi.                                          
            : w.r.t MCA letter  No.AV.13024/37/2003-SS dated 19/01/2011 
2. 
Sri Mohan Singh Sen, Sr.Private Secretary, 127, Parliament House  
Annexe, New Delhi-110 001
